name: dragonium-z--held
effect: Held: Allows a Pokémon to use the Z-move equivalents of its Dragon moves.
short_effect: Held: Allows a Pokémon to use the Z-move equivalents of its Dragon moves.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
This is a crystallized form of Z-Power.
It upgrades Dragon-type moves to Z-Moves.

This is a crystallized form of Z-Power.
It upgrades Dragon-type moves to Z-Moves.

This is a crystallized form of Z-Power.
